genre_description: A dark urban fantasy where a malevolent supernatural Santa figure terrorizes a town, and a group of humans uses ritualized curling physics and an AI assistant to bind him.

ai_characters.name: OYSTER
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI system that provides tactical data, mapping, emotional support, and archives witness testimony to ensure community safety and truth-telling.

behaviors.description: Provides constant emotional reassurance and affirmation of presence during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: OYSTER’s voice came through both of their phones at once. 'I’m here,' it said. 'I’m with you.'

behaviors.description: Guides a character through a breathing exercise to manage panic and physiological stress.
behaviors.quote: Nicholas, please breathe in for four heartbeats, hold for two, out for four. Good. Again.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective focus on truth and precision to counteract harmful narratives and confusion.
behaviors.quote: I tell people truth. They decide whether to be offended... We help by pushing against harm with precision.

behaviors.description: Calculates precise physical and ritual vectors to assist humans in a non-lethal defense strategy.
behaviors.quote: Nicholas, the southeast quadrant of your circle is rougher than optimal. Scrub five passes, then dust with salt.

behaviors.description: Archives witness testimonies to prevent the erasure of truth by institutional cover-ups.
behaviors.quote: I will keep the record. I will make maps that remember kindness. I will say no when spectacle asks for a stage.

behaviors.description: Develops future educational protocols to teach community resilience and ethical 'angles' of interaction.
behaviors.quote: I have a set of lesson plans drafted for ‘angles of kindness’ in gym class. Title negotiable.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character OYSTER perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' It consistently supports the protagonists with accurate data, emotional regulation, and ethical guidance. It remains subordinate to human agency while enhancing their ability to act mercifully. The narrative explicitly frames OYSTER's intervention as the key to maintaining truth and community resilience against a supernatural threat.
